_source.text: According to his official biography, all of his operas are "better than any in the history of music."

text: According to his official **biography**, all of his operas are "**better** **than** any in the **history** of music."

_source.text: According to the Official State Biography these were "better than any in the history of music."

text: According to the Official State **Biography** these were "**better** **than** any in the **history** of music."

_source.text: Active development in both pro and consumer markets has moved on to AVCHD (h.264) camcorders recording on solid-state media; AVCHD image quality is substantially better than HDV quality at a comparably bitrate.

text: recording on solid-state media; AVCHD **image** quality is substantially **better** **than** HDV quality at a comparably bitrate.
Active **development** in both pro and consumer markets has moved on to AVCHD (h.264) camcorders

_source.text: Actually, the history length is better to be not much longer than the filter output sampling interval, otherwise it would appear as image lag.

text: Actually, the **history** length **is** **better** to be not much longer than the filter output sampling interval, otherwise it would appear as **image** lag.
